<TextLayoutLeft>

    <div class="if text lead">

        Our typeface; If Sans â€” plays a key role in our visual identity. It encapsulates our "Simply Personal" concept
        by being a functional typeface with a personal style. With a simple, light and airy feeling it offers a good
        legibility. With typographic details inspired by the written expression of calligraphy makes it human.

    </div>

</TextLayoutLeft>

<TextLayout>

    <div class="if text body">
        Two typefaces are available for different applications:

        - Our primary typeface is If Sans, which is used for all external, public-facing communication.
        - Our fallback typeface is Arial, which is used for email communication and when technical limitations prevent
        the use of the primary typeface.

    </div>
